answers.answer: It could be an Endocrine problem: Hyperthyroidism, Type 1 diabetes or Hormonal changes during puberty which is aggravated by the stress. See a Doctor for Blood Testing  and Nutritional Management .

question: I'm 15 years old... Male. 128 lbs. 5"10.I used to weigh like 145. And that was a month ago...So I guess I lost 15 pounds in a month without meaning to?Oh and I'm sure this is accurate so don't yell at me :PIs that alot? Is it bad?I'm pretty skinny. Ribs are poking out now...Should I try and eat more?I dunno... I've just never lost weight before :/I have noticed my appetite has gone down a bit...I've been very depressed lately too... So I guess that might be causing it?
title: Stress causing unintentional weight loss?
